definitions.definition: A type of early modern sword that has a broad double-edged blade for cutting (as opposed to the more slender thrust-oriented rapier ) and typically a basket hilt .
A person armed with such a sword.
A flat, rectangular bread made from corn ( maize ) and beans by the Cherokee , traditionally by boiling rather than baking it.

main_definition: ( history ) A type of early modern sword that has a broad double-edged blade for cutting (as opposed to the more slender thrust-oriented rapier ) and typically a basket hilt .
secondary_definitions: A person armed with such a sword.
( colloquial , often fantasy ) Synonym of longsword .
A flat, rectangular bread made from corn ( maize ) and beans by the Cherokee , traditionally by boiling rather than baking it.
